attributes.action: Investigate how many people have been issued a DNR certificate since March 2020?
attributes.additional_details: If there has been malpractice then those found responsible need to be held to account.
attributes.background: Investigate how many people have unknowingly been issued with a DNR certificate since March 2020, and on what grounds? Were any pressurised into signing? And to find out whether family members were involved in the process where a patient lacked capacity, or whether families have been bypassed.
